name: Pawn Empire
description:
Have you ever wanted to run your own pawn shop? Now you can! Introducing Pawn Empire the game, which allows you to manage and run your very own pawn shop. Here’s your chance to turn your pawn shop into the empire you’ve always wanted.

Get ready to start negotiating with your customers to buy and sell all sorts of items including jewelry, electronics, collectables, and rare one of a kind pieces. Not interested in buying an item, offer a loan on it and collect interest on the full value of the item. In a hurry to sell an item, auction it. With the auction feature it will automatically sell your item to the highest bidder. Don’t forget to remodel the exterior of your pawn shop to attract more high-end customers. The shop will also allow you to upgrade the interior of your pawn shop to make things easier for yourself such as increasing the size of your inventory. Make sure complete achievements to increase your pawn empire rank which in turn will help you get better offers and also charge a higher interest rate on the items. Not all items are worth the same so keep an eye out on the condition of the items you choose to buy as it will greatly affect the value when you’re ready to sell them. Don’t forget your not alone you can get your items appraised to find an estimated value of them before you buy or sell them.

Over 70 achievements
Over 350 items to buy and sell
Offer Loans
Auction items
Get items appraised
Store Shop to purchase interior and exterior upgrades
Daily giveaways
Easy to pick up and play
